text: Notzilla is a 2019 American comedy-action fantasy giant monster parody film produced by Creepy Ex-Boyfriend, the film was directed by Mitch Teemley. this film inspired by many japanese monster movies from 1950s'-1970s' itself as a spoof of Godzilla. ==Plot== in 1962, United Nations and JSDF to kill a monster known as Notzilla by a paleontologist named Professor Honda. an monster egg started to hatches Notzilla to started to drink beer and grow another times, escaping Notzilla as a 60 meters tall, for drinking full of beer an tries to rampage on the city. ==Cast== * Frederic Eng-li as Hiro Honda * Tifani Ahren Davies as Shirley * Tim Bensch as Dr. Blowheart * Becca Kravitz as Dr. Butay * Kenneth Early as Dr. Bloch * Charlie Harper as Dr. Shortman * Darnell Benjamin as Colonel Stickler * Roger Cupp as Lieutenant Cupp * Michael Wilhelm as Dr. Mungish * Samantha Russell as Pearl * Rupert Spraul as Kenny Wannabee * Christine Jones as Gen. Specific * Michael Bath as Gen. Dirk Bogus * Spencer Lackley as Bobby Bleech * Jacob Baker as Notzilla ==Release== they the film released in August 18, 2020 in VOD format. ==Other websites== * Category:2010s science fiction movies Category:American monster movies Category:American parody movies Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:2010s comedy movies
title: Notzilla
